things_to_do.title: Fushimi Inari Shrine Hike
things_to_do.subtitle: Ten thousand vermillion gates lead you up the sacred mountain

things_to_do.title: Jonkershoek Valley Hike
things_to_do.subtitle: Trek through fynbos-covered mountains with waterfall rewards
things_to_do.description: The trail climbs steeply. Proteas bloom. At the top, a waterfall cascades into a clear pool. You cool off, breathe deep, and feel utterly alive.

things_to_do.title: Art Gallery Walk
things_to_do.subtitle: Explore Cape Dutch architecture and local art in historic Stellenbosch
things_to_do.description: Oak-lined streets. White-gabled buildings. You wander galleries, sip coffee, browse art. Stellenbosch feels genteel, creative, timeless.

things_to_do.title: Big Five Safari Drive
things_to_do.subtitle: Hunt for lions, elephants, leopards, rhinos, and buffalo on safari
things_to_do.description: The jeep rumbles. Aheadâ€”a lioness crouches in tall grass. Your guide whispers. You hold your breath. Then she moves, powerful and focused. This is Africaâ€”wild, raw, unforgettable.

things_to_do.title: Walking Safari with Rangers
things_to_do.subtitle: Track animals on foot with armed rangers in the African bush
things_to_do.description: No vehicle. Just your feet, the ranger, and the wild. You walk quietly, spotting tracks, learning animal behavior. When an elephant crosses your path, your heart stops. This is safari, raw.

things_to_do.title: Sundowner Safari
things_to_do.subtitle: Watch the sun set over the savanna with sundowner drinks
things_to_do.description: The jeep stops on a hill. The ranger pours gin and tonics. The sun melts into orange and pink. Somewhere, a lion roars. You sip, you watch, and you never want to leave.
